title: Google\Cloud\Domains\V1beta1\TransferDomainRequest
name: TransferDomainRequest
description:
Request for the TransferDomain method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.domains.v1beta1.TransferDomainRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The parent resource of the Registration. Must be in the format projects/*/locations/*.

params.name: data.registration
params.description: Required. The complete Registration resource to be created. You can leave registration.dns_settings unset to import the domain's current DNS configuration from its current registrar. Use this option only if you are sure that the domain's current DNS service does not cease upon transfer, as is often the case for DNS services provided for free by the registrar.

params.name: data.contact_notices
params.description: The list of contact notices that you acknowledge. The notices needed here depend on the values specified in registration.contact_settings.

params.name: data.yearly_price
params.description: Required. Acknowledgement of the price to transfer or renew the domain for one year. Call RetrieveTransferParameters to obtain the price, which you must acknowledge.

params.name: data.authorization_code
params.description: The domain's transfer authorization code. You can obtain this from the domain's current registrar.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: Validate the request without actually transferring the domain.
